oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition services home movie, 1973
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of unknown member of the congregation handling serpent. Women playing instruments. Officiant leading prayer. Home footage. Man with two serpents dancing in front of congregation. Man putting serpent in shirt. Woman witness bearing in front of congregation. Man lay preaching on older woman. Congregates dancing with fire. Man putting large serpent in box. Home footage of children. Congregation on knees praying. Woman retrieving serpent from box. Man dancing with two serpents. Children pretending to handle serpents.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Lay preaching; Prayer; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Jesus Name tradition services home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
